## Installation


```r
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("easystats/insight")
```
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(insight)
```

## Examples

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Petal.Width * Species, data = iris)
```


### Retrieve the model's variables:

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
model_terms(model)
```

### Retrieve the model's data:

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
model_data(model)
```
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(head(model_data(model)))
```
